mapper.insert: insert into browhistory(pid, uid, visit_ip, visit_date) VALUES (#{pid}, #{uid}, #{ipAddr}, now()) on DUPLICATE key update visit_date = now()
mapper.select: select pid, pname, shopprice, shopmmdprice, homeimg from productsinfo p where mer_id = #{id} and p.recsts = '1' and state = 1

select pid, pname, shopprice, shopmmdprice, m.mer_name, homeimg from productsinfo p left join merchant m on p.mer_id = m.mer_id where p.recsts = '1' and state = 1 and (pname like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or title like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or m.mer_ename like concat('%', #{key}, '%') or m.mer_name like concat('%', #{key}, '%'))

select p.pid, pname, title, `desc`, homeimg, paramimg, shopprice, shopmmdprice, weight, volume, isfree, inventory, sell, commentcount, bestcount, mediumccount, badcount, average, pc.pd_url, pc.id, ps.content, ps.sid, pd.img, pd.id pdid, sku.sku_id, sku.sku_val, sku.price, sku.mmdprice, sku.repertory, sku.salenum from productsinfo p left join prod_carousal pc on p.pid = pc.pid left join prod_sku sku on p.pid = sku.pid left join prod_detailimg pd on p.pid = pd.pid left join prod_service ps on concat(',', p.service_ids, ',') like concat('%,', ps.sid, ',%') where p.pid = #{pid} and p.state = 1 order by pc.pd_order, pd.ord

select rel.prop_name_id, (select prop_name from prod_skupropname where prop_id = rel.prop_name_id) prop_name, rel.prop_val_id, (select prop_val from prod_skupropval pvl where pvl.prop_name_id = rel.prop_name_id and pvl.prop_id = rel.prop_val_id) prop_valname from prod_proprel rel where rel.pid = #{pid}
insert into prod_collect(pid, uid, coll_date) VALUES (#{pid}, #{uid}, now())

select.foreach: (select '${date}' vdate, b.id, b.pid, date_format(b.visit_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') visit_date, p.pname, p.title, p.homeimg from browhistory b left join productsinfo p on b.pid = p.pid where b.uid = #{uid})

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM prod_collect where id in #{id}
